name: Choplifter III
description: Helicopter rescue mission game where players must save hostages while fighting enemy forces
reason: Minimal text required to play. Gameplay is entirely visual and action-based.

name: Barkley Shut Up and Jam!
japaneseTitle: バークレーのシャットアップアンドジャム！
romaji: Bākurē no Shatto Appu ando Jamu!
description: Basketball game featuring Charles Barkley with arcade-style gameplay
reason: Sports game with minimal text. Menu navigation is straightforward with universal icons.
